de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision

Class TwoToneImageFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision.TwoToneImageFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class TwoToneImageFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp
    TwoToneImageFilter class. Used for filtering images into with two color images. Also provides a tolerance for the color.
    Author:
    Zabuza
